channel.title: Screenings on IKMC
channel.description: Recent content in Screenings on IKMC

item.title: August 2024, Week 2
item.description: This week we have something special for you guys! In addition to two amazing movies - we have a super special screening of Manikbabur Megh on Sunday, and an interaction session with the film crew! Read on below to know more. The Wind Rises (2013) - FRIDAY (09-08-2024) Director: Hayao Miyazaki Genre: Anime Run Time: 126 min Jiro dreams of flying and designing beautiful airplanes, inspired by the famous Italian aeronautical designer Caproni.

item.title: August 2024, Week 1
item.description: Welcome back to campus! We hope that your summer was fun - but it is now time to strap in for the new semester. To help you unwind after a week of shifting rooms and cleaning, we have three amazing movies lines up for the weekend; Stories about a deranged soldier, a misled dramatist, and a (very sad) musician. Woyzeck (1979) - SATURDAY (03-08-2024) Director: Werner Herzog Genre: Drama Run Time: 82 min
